summary: Changes all female children to hot teenagers.
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION; Please read the whole description if you have other mods so you know is something may be amiss!
One day I wondered if there was a mod that added teenagers to the game... no there wasn't, at least not without doing something else I didn't want. So I decided to put my amateur skills to play and made the mod myself.
This replaces ALL female children with teen versions of themselves. These new versions include tattoos, warpaint, skin retextures and resizes. I basically changed the children to adults and downsized them to 9/10th of the adult size. Imagine they're all 18 so do as you wish with them ;)
Currently all are changed to teens and two or three have custom faces. If you can use the Creation kit feel free to edit it to your preferences. This shouldn't conflict with anything as long as you load it last(except maybe mods that have the children say stuff, idk) as it only changes the female children's race, face, voice and size. However the voice is generic and so any old dialogue will be replaced so for example, when Braith bullies that kid she'll be silent but he'll still respond. If you want an immersive playthrough then this could be a little immersion breaking but is it worth it??? HELL YEAH.
FUTURE UPDATES.
I hope to add a custom voice to replace their original dialogue.
I WILL change all the faces.
I might edit their AI 
I might edit their inventory more (I've already changed their outfit, it's now the thieves guild master armour)

THIS DOESN'T CHANGE DLC CHILDREN, ONLY VANILLA!!!

Recommended Mods
CBBE 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Triss armour (change the guild master armour to change all the teens clothing to what you wish)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4708/?
PLEASE REPORT ANY AND ALL BUGS TO ME!!! PLEASE! This is very early stages and I don't even know if it'll work properly as my skyrim is heavily modded, but it should do as I only changed vanilla assets... I think. 
If you're not sure GIVE IT A GO and if it doesn't work please tell me, I DO recommend manually saving first though.
author: Rhykynok
